Package wiiremotej

Interface Summary
WiiDevice Interface describing a device that can connect to the Wii via Bluetooth.
 

Class Summary
AbsoluteAnalogStickMouse A class for implementing a mouse using an analog stick with absolute positioning.
AccelerationConstants Contains acceleration constants for use in WRAccelerationEvents.
AccelerometerMouse An interface for implementing mouse functionality using the Wii Remote through the accelerometer.
AnalogStickData Represents a simple XY analog stick.
AnalogStickMouse A class for implementing a mouse using an analog stick.
BalanceBoard A class representing a Nintendo (R) Wii Balance Board (TM).
ButtonKeyMap Maps a button/button mask on the Wii remote to a one or more keys.
ButtonMap Maps a button on the remote or an extension to one or more actions.
ButtonMouseMap Maps a button on the Wii remote to a mouse press.
ButtonMouseWheelMap Maps a button on the Wii remote to the mouse scroll-wheel.
ClassicControllerCalibrationData Contains calibration data for use in WRClassicControllerExtensionEvents.
ClassicControllerExtension A class representing a Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM) Classic controller extension.
GuitarCalibrationData Contains calibration data for use in WRGuitarExtensionEvents.
GuitarExtension A class representing a Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM) Guitar extension.
IRAccelerometerMouse An interface for implementing mouse functionality using the Wii Remote through the IR sensor and accelerometer.
IRLight A light dot seen by the IR Sensor.
IRMouse An interface for implementing mouse functionality using the Wii Remote through the IR sensor.
IRSensitivitySettings Contains sensitivity settings for the Wii Remote's IR sensor.
MassConstants Contains mass constants for use in BBBalanceEvents.
MotionAccelerometerMouse A class for implementing a mouse using the accelerometer.
NunchukCalibrationData Contains calibration data for use in WRNunchukExtensionEvents.
NunchukExtension A class representing a Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM) Nunchuk extension.
PositionInfo Contains information about the WiiRemote's current position, including Y and Z position, pitch, and roll.
PrebufferedSound Takes the given array of sound data and packages it into ready-made reports that can be sent immediately via sendCommand.
RelativeAnalogStickMouse A class for implementing a mouse using an analog stick with relative positioning.
TiltAccelerometerMouse A class for implementing a mouse using the accelerometer.
WiiRemote A class representing a Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WiiRemoteExtension A class representing a Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM) extension, such as the Nunchuk.
WiiRemoteExtensionFactory A class representing a Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM) extension factory.
WiiRemoteJ Library for connecting to and interacting with a Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM) and Balance Board (TM) via Bluetooth (R).
WiiRemoteMouse An class for implementing mouse functionality using the Wii Remote.
